scene_description: chef bao bao presents their dish to the judges, a vietnamese pork frost ice cream with a noodle churros and a meringue on top. the judges are impressed with the creativity and presentation of the dish.

the judges announce that chef bao bao is the winner of the competition, praising their ability to use noodles better than everybody else. chef bao bao is overjoyed and thanks the judges, winning $10,000.
chef bao bao is asked what their mom will think about their win, and they excitedly respond, planning to celebrate with a drink tonight. the scene ends with a sense of joy and accomplishment.
